author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-SIG ‍Says Non-Executive Director Chris Geoghegan Retired From Board​
text:
March 9 (Reuters) - SIG Plc:
* ‍CHRIS GEOGHEGAN, A NON-EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR AND SENIOR INDEPENDENT DIRECTOR OF COMPANY, HAS TODAY RETIRED FROM BOARD​
* MEL EWELL, A NON-EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR OF COMPANY, HAS REPLACED MR GEOGHEGAN AS ITS SENIOR INDEPENDENT DIRECTOR.
* MR EWELL WILL ALSO RETIRE FROM BOARD, ONCE A NEW NON-EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR HAS BEEN IDENTIFIED AND APPOINTED Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
